synopsis.text: The Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood OVA Collection offers a captivating look into untold stories from the lives of favorite characters. Edward and Alphonse chase rumors of a blind alchemist named Jude who succeeded in human transmutation, hoping his methods could help them regain their bodies. Before meeting the nefarious Homunculi, the brothers return to Resembool and find a clever way to avoid Winry's wrath over Ed's broken automail. The collection also unveils hidden depths of Riza, Winry, Izumi Curtis, Roy Mustang, and Maes Hughes. As a teenager, Riza lets her hair grow while Winry's ear piercings are explained. A young Izumi struggles to comprehend alchemy while surviving the extreme north. Mustang and Hughesâ€™ legendary friendship takes root as military school rivals before being tested by the Ishval War's brutality. With shocking revelations and meaningful backstories about beloved characters, this thrilling new addition to the Fullmetal universe expertly balances drama and excitement while rewarding loyal fans.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
